subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Last month Louise Friberg, 31, left the L.P.G.A. Tour and the only profession she has known, choosing the anxiety and exhilaration of finding a new job.
snippet: Last month Louise Friberg, 31, left the L.P.G.A. Tour and the only profession she has known, choosing the anxiety and exhilaration of finding a new job.
